TransactionStateContext.OngoingGameState: When a user starts a game and receives initial cards via the deal function.
TransactionStateContext.GameEndState: When the game concludes due to conditions in the checkGameResult function.

ExternalInteractions.TokenTransfers: Ether is transferred from the player to the contract when a bet is placed. Prizes are sent to the player if they win.
ExternalInteractions.RandomCardAssignment: Randomness for card assignment via Deck.deal function based on block data (vulnerable to prediction).
